name: Escape (itch) (WAngieZhao)
description:
You were caught by the giants - try to escape while they are sleeping! Browsing the room and see what you can use. Do not bump into the giants in the bed, they will catch you back to the cage.

The game is made up of a 3-step simple puzzle. The object is to practice setting up 3D scenes that can create a certain mood with selective assets, lightings, and music. Moreover, I was trying to create the pickup functions for players to hold certain items and use them in other places in-game.

**If WebGL is not working properly, please download the PC build: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1f-hQY1OXr0W84b5iLxiETiLUH_qgGF-v/view?usp=sharing

**Get Stucked? Check the hint**

**Step 1**

Push the cage to right, let the book pile on the right fall on the cage thus unlock the cage door.

**Step 2**

Push the book-dominos in front of the gate, use the slant books as a bridge to reach the screwdrivers on the nightstand.

**Step 3**

Jump off the nightstand. Jump on the book pile at the end of the bed, then jump to the bed frame, side table, armchair. Using the screwdriver to break the vent next to the armchair on the wall.
